snippet.title: A Good Day to Die Hard - Mobile Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The official game of the new Die Hard movie! Yippee ki-yay, Mother Russia!


John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working to prevent a nuclear-weapons heist, causing father and son to team up against underworld forces. Become John and Jack McClane and relive the non-stop action thrills of the explosive new movie, A Good Day to Die Hard!

 Play it now on mobile!
➫ Storyline and dialog faithful to the film: Relive the tension, humor and intrigue of the movie.
➫ Play as John and Jack McClane in each character's most exciting action scenes.
➫ Diverse gameplay in this non-stop action shooter! Run & gun, quick-time events, and vehicle chases!
➫ Explore 8 giants levels inspired directly by the movie, from the Moscow courthouse to Prypiat.
➫ Wipe out enemies with 7 weapons, like the Pistol and Shotgun, plus the Perfect Reloading System.
